alert.note: Alert for Larimer; Weld (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Air Quality Alert issued February 03 at 3:10PM MST by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...AIR QUALITY HEALTH ADVISORY FOR FINE PARTICULATES FROM 300 PM FRIDAY UNTIL 900 AM SATURDAY... The Colorado Department of Public Health and Environment has issued the following... WHAT...Air Quality Health Advisory for Fine Particulates. WHERE...Weld and Larimer Counties. Locations include, but are not limited to Greeley, Windsor, and Timnath. WHEN...300 PM Friday February 03 to 900 AM Saturday February 04 IMPACTS...Cold and stagnant weather conditions have allowed fine particulate matter concentrations to climb into the Unhealthy for Sensitive Groups category. Elevated concentrations of fine particulates will continue through Friday evening, improving by Saturday. HEALTH INFORMATION...Public Health Recommendations: Increasing likelihood of respiratory symptoms in sensitive individuals, aggravation of heart or lung disease and premature mortality in people with cardiopulmonary disease and older adults. People with heart or lung disease, older adults, and children should reduce prolonged or heavy exertion.
